post.author: Andrew
post.content:
Hi everyone, Today my company got attacked by Goner virus, Now I'm still getting a bunch of e-mail sent by co-workers. around over 1000 e-mails so far. This virus has some feature as following: 1) subject: Hi 2) Context: When I saw this screen saver, I immediately thought about you.
The attached file name is "Goner.scr". If you open this attached file, you'll get infected.
So be careful, everyone. P/S I had to turn mail alarm off, it's so annoying now.
post.title: New Virus Alert
